[TC-017] User can login using valid email and password
[TC-018]User with invalid login credentials
[TC-019]User can't log in without email
User uses valid username and password
After entering valid data and clicking on the "Sign in" button, the "Home" page (of the logged in user) opens
User can't see / copy / cut out the entered password
User can't log in without password
User can to paste a password text in the “password“ field
Email field is no register sensitive.
[TC-015] User can go to the "Fork on GitHub" page after clicking on link
[TC-001] User can go to the "Home" page after clicking on link
[TC-002] User can go to the "Home" page after clicking on link
[TC-003] User can go to the "Sign in" page after clicking on link
[TC-004] User can go to the "Sign up" page after clicking on link
[TC-020] User can go to the "Sign in" page after clicking on link
[TC-021]User can't leave the email field blank
[TC-022]User can't leave the password field blank
User can use the characters "- _" to use in the "username" field
User can use Only Latin characters in "username" field
User can input only unique username
User can input only unique email
User can input only 4 elements(Integer/Characters/Symbols) in "Password" field
In the field "password" you can enter a maximum of 30 elements(Integer/Characters/Symbols)
If user input not a unique Usename/Email , the system displays: ERROR MESSAGE
User can't see / copy / cut out the entered password
User can confirm password
Validation of the uniqueness of the "username" field case-insensitive
User can't register by entering only numbers in the "username" field
User can't use invalid email form( without any elements [name]@[domain].[top-domain] )
$pecial characters in "Username" field
$pecial characters in "Email" field
User must specify at least 4 letters in the "Username" field
User can specify a maximum of 36 letters in the "Username" field
The password specified by the user must match the required password form
After entering valid data and clicking on the "Sign in" button, the "Home" page (of the logged in user) opens

[TC-030] User can enter any tags after clicking "Enter" key
[TC-031] User can publish article after clicking [Publish Article] button
User can create two or more articles with the same title;
“Title of article can’t be empty (minimum 5 symbols)” error message appears;
"What’s this article about?" can’t be empty (minimum 10 symbols) error message appears;
“Body of article can't be blank.” error message appears. Min 20 symbols;
User can enter in Article title max 240 symbols
User can enter in "What’s this article about?" max 240 symbols
User can enter in "Write your article (in markdown)" max 9000 symbols
Tag can contain 2-30 symbols (only letters and numbers);
Article can contain 1-10 tags;
After successful publication of an article, the user gets redirected to the User's Article page.
